page.title: 09Ringmer Employment Survey
page.content:
Survey based on information received from Junior Department of Ringmer County Primary School. {Fathers}working in Ringmer {16 {Fathers}working elsewhere {120 {Mothers}working in Ringmer {33 {Mothers}working elsewhere {64 {Elder siblings}working in Ringmer {7 {Elder siblings}working elsewhere {26 {Total:}56 (21%) working in Ringmer 210 (79%) working elsewhere
